Events that occurred on 3 December.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1916 - G.B. Smith, one of the T.C.B.S., dies of gas-gangrene in his wounds, sustained 4 days earlier. The news doesn't reach Tolkien until the 16th.
1954 - The BBC Third Programme broadcasts the radio play of The Homecoming of Beorhtnoth.
1955 - Tolkien's poem Imram is published in Time and Tide.
1967 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 298a.
1998 - Tyalië Tyelelliéva issue 13 is published.
2003 - Actor David Hemmings dies.
2004 - The Lord of the Rings Symphony plays in Newark, New Jersey.
2009 - The Lord of the Rings Online: Siege of Mirkwood is released in Europe.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Frodo and Samwise rest in Rivendell and prepare for their quest to destroy the One Ring.
